titleStmt.title: The Virgin Mary misrepresented by the Roman Church in the traditions of that church, concerning her life and glory, and in the devotions paid to her, as the mother of God ...
titleStmt.author: Patrick, John, 1632-1695.
Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Patrick. Attributed also to Simon Patrick. Cf. BM; NUC pre-1956.
No more published. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
(from t.p.) Pt. 1 Wherein two of her feasts, her conception and nativity, are considered.
